title: How to Make Sopaipillas Rellenas (Stuffed Sopaipillas)

steps.headline: Heat shortening in a medium-sized skillet at medium heat.
Add beans and liquid to the shortening.
steps.description: Mash beans and cook for 10-15 minutes.

steps.headline: Add 1 1/2 cups cheese to the beans and stir for 2-3 minutes at low heat.
Garnish with remaining cheese before serving.
steps.description: Frijoles refritos may be used as a filling for burritos or sopapillas, or served as a side dish.

text: Heat shortening in a medium-sized skillet at medium heat.  Add beans and liquid to the shortening. Mash beans and cook for 10-15 minutes. Add 1 1/2 cups cheese to the beans and stir for 2-3 minutes at low heat.  Garnish with remaining cheese before serving. Frijoles refritos may be used as a filling for burritos or sopapillas, or served as a side dish.
